Cactus-themed board game: Create a board game where players navigate through a desert landscape, collecting cactus fruits and avoiding obstacles such as sandstorms and snakes. The game could be played with friends or family, and the objective is to be the first player to reach the oasis.

Cactus-based skincare routine: Develop a skincare routine that utilizes the unique properties of cactus plants to provide nourishment and hydration to the skin. This could include a cactus-infused face cream, a cactus-based toner, and a cactus-infused serum to help soothe and protect the skin.

Cactus-inspired fashion collection: Create a fashion collection that incorporates elements of cacti into the designs. This could include clothing and accessories such as cactus-print dresses, cactus-shaped handbags, and cactus-inspired jewelry. The collection could be marketed as a sustainable and eco-friendly alternative to traditional fashion.

Cactus-based home decor: Design a line of home decor items such as vases, candles, and wall art that incorporate the natural shapes and colors of cacti. These items could be made from materials such as glass, ceramic, or natural fibers, and could be used to add a unique and desert-inspired touch to any home.

Cactus-themed restaurant: Open a restaurant that serves dishes inspired by the desert landscape of the cactus. The menu could include dishes such as cactus-based salads, grilled cactus skewers, and cactus-infused cocktails. The restaurant could also feature a unique desert landscape design, complete with cacti and other desert plants, to create a truly immersive dining experience.
